chinese: 这种模棱两可的说法似乎自相矛盾。
别再向我报告模棱两可的情报，教授。

english: The ancient oracles were often vague and equivocal .
chinese: 古代的神谕常是意义模糊和模棱两可的。

english: It was implied by his non-committal opening remark .
chinese: 这在他那篇模棱两可的开场白中暗含着。

english: Heit's large eyes bulged and conveyed hints of much more than was implied by his noncommittal opening remark .
chinese: 海特鼓起大眼睛，这比他那篇模棱两可的开场白含义要深得多了。
模棱两可的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He cannot be ambiguous . - but art is ambiguous
chinese: 它不能模棱两可但艺术就是模棱两可的

english: And music , the most ambiguous of all the arts
chinese: 音乐，所有艺术形式中最模棱两可的东西

english: Fuzzy3 goals lead to fuzzy results
chinese: 模棱两可的目标导致模糊不清的结果。

english: She is quick to notice the ambiguity in the article
chinese: 她很快就察觉出了文中的那些模棱两可的意思。

english: He give us an ambiguous answer
chinese: 他给了我们一个模棱两可的答复。

english: In the face of ambiguity , refuse the temptation to guess
chinese: 碰到模棱两可的地方，绝对不要去作猜测。

english: She was quick to notice the ambiguities in the article
chinese: 她很快就察觉出了文中的那些模棱两可的意思

english: I don ' t think we can make quick decision based on ambiguous data
chinese: 仅凭这些模棱两可的数据我们还无法作出决断

english: We did not know which of the two roads to take
chinese: 他的模棱两可的指导使我们很迷惑以至于我们不知道该走哪条路了。
这是一个模棱两可的答复
